resources.string: Usage: Search for your future UF professors and find official UF evaluations as well as ratings, comments, and textbooks. Brought to you by the RateAGator Team.
\nAlso available are the the required textbooks for each course as well as user comments and ratings for each professor.\n

Contact Information:
UFRateAGator@gmail.com
Or visit our Facebook page "Rateagator"
